mapper.select: SELECT EQP_ID , FILE_ID , ICON_ID , EQP_NM , EQP_CONTENT , EQP_WIDTH , EQP_HEIGHT , EQP_X , EQP_Y , EQP_VISIBLE , EQP_ENABLE , CRT_ID , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CRT_DT , CHG_ID , TO_CHAR(CHG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CHG_DT FROM EQUIPMENT ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(EQP_ID) DESC

SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_NM , FILE_CONTENT , FILE_FULL_NM , CRT_ID , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CRT_DT , CHG_ID , TO_CHAR(CHG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CHG_DT FROM DRAWING ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(FILE_ID) DESC

SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_NM , FILE_CONTENT , FILE_FULL_NM , CRT_ID , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CRT_DT , CHG_ID , TO_CHAR(CHG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CHG_DT FROM DRAWING WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(FILE_ID) DESC
